item.description:
All attendees must read, understand and agree to the waiver/liability as outlined by this website.

 

The Jackson Ski Touring Foundation offers a great trail system with fantastic views!!  It is a great place to ski for both advanced and novice skiers.  For anyone who has never cross country skied Jackson, we strongly recommend it. 

The cost of a one day trail ticket is approximately $21.00.  Please check the Jackson Ski Touring Foundation web site.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the main ticket office at 153 Main Street, Jackson, NH 03846
item.why: The Jackson Ski Touring Foundation offers a great trail system with fantastic views!! It is a great place to ski for both advanced and novice skiers. For anyone who has never cross country skied Jackson, we strongly recommend it.
item.name: JACKSON NH CROSS COUNTRY SKIING
